name: Residenz am Dom gGmbH Boardinghouse Apartments

reviews.text: Great location just minutes from train, Don, and shopping. Plenty of food and shopping very accessible. Rooms are spacious, spotless and handicap accessible. Staff is welcoming and very kind. Ask for a courtyard view as streets nearby are very busy and there is construction next door that starts very early. Remember you are in a senior living apartment complex so be respectful of the permanent residents. This is NOT the hotel to bring large groups of loud people to! Apartment had a fridge with small freezer (we made ice!!!) and dishes and silverware for 4 along with an oven and small appliances like a coffee pot. There is also a cooktop and basic pots. Water pressure in shower is great and bathroom was quite large. Balcony with table and chairs and a small dining set gave us plenty of room to sit. No air conditioning but big windows and good airflow really helped a lot.

Very comfortable accommodation, good value for money and friendly service. Perfectly located close to the dome and the main train station. Rooms and furnishings are very spacious but a little dated, but at the price a good proposition for a longer stay - especially compared to other options.

Honest housekeeping staff who returned me a valuable item left in room. Thank you. And thanks Connie, Comanda, and Mikaela Flores for your help in retrieving it. Big rooms/apartment nice location, and quiet because it’s an elderly residence.

The room is big, actually its apartment.
The service in the front desk is excellent.
The location is the best, few meters from the Dom.
But, actually its not a hotel, its more nursing home for old ladies.
Even the facilities in the room are very old. The bed are not comfortable, they need to refresh it.

Awesome rooms, facilities and staff.Problem is internet. Wi-fi is so slow or disconnected regularly. Also this place is part of elder house. We loved this place cuz be with elders and say hello to them is priceless. Also u have to test for corona when you check in but it’s free of charge but if you wanna use pool u have to test every 24 hours. If they improve internet this place way better than hilton:)
